verses.verse: And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H2416>old:<s%> these were the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah.<s%>

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H7153>Kirjatharba;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> and to <S%H1058>weep<s%> for her.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up from <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> his <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> with you: <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>plot<s%> with you, that I may <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to him,

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> us, my <S%H113>lord:<s%> you are a <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us: in the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of our <S%H6913>sepulchers<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of us shall <S%H3607>withhold<s%> from you his <S%H6913>sepulcher,<s%> but that you may <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> If it be your <S%H5315>mind<s%> that I should <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight;<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me, and <S%H6293>entreat<s%> for me to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%>

That he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has, <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H7097>end<s%> of his <S%H7704>field;<s%> for as much <S%H3701>money<s%> as it is <S%H4392>worth<s%> he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it me for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>plot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.

And <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth:<s%> and <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> even of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me: the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> I you, and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is therein, I <S%H5414>give<s%> it you; in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> I it you: <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> But if you will <S%H5414>give<s%> it, I <S%H3863>pray<s%> you, <S%H8085>hear<s%> me: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H7704>field;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it of me, and I will <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to him,

My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: the <S%H776>land<s%> is worth <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is that <S%H996>between<s%> me and you? <S%H6912>bury<s%> therefore your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>named<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5674>current<s%> money with the merchant.

And the <S%H7704>field<s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%><S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was therein, and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that were in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, were made <S%H6965>sure<s%>

To <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H4736>possession<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is therein, were made <S%H6965>sure<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>plot<s%> by the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>
